message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,500. I believe it will be very beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. However, the product's value is quite high, and $13,000 is cutting it a bit close for me.  Could you do $13,800?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $13,500. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
